English: Each time a skill in hand is exchanged or discarded, deal %a damage to a random enemy and restore %b Healing Gauge to the ally with the lowest HP. Can trigger up to 20 times per turn.
Chinese: 每次手中的技能被交换/丢弃时，对随机敌人造成 %a 点伤害，恢复体力最低的队友 %b 点体力。1回合最多触发20次。

English: Each time a skill in hand is exchanged or discarded, deal %a damage to all enemies. Can trigger up to 20 times per turn.
Chinese: 每次手中的技能被交换/丢弃时，对所有敌人造成 %a 点伤害。1回合最多触发20次。

English: Grants Healing Gauge Protection. All damage received becomes 0.
Chinese: 保护体力极限，受到的伤害转变为0。

English: Grants Healing Gauge Protection. Increases all resistances.
Chinese: 保护体力极限。全抗性增加。

English:
At the start of battle, gain 1 Max Mana. If Awakened (Max Mana exceeds 7), some cards gain additional effects. 
Awakened: Draw 1 additional skill at the start of battle.
Chinese:
战斗开始时，获得1点最大法力值。如果觉醒（最大法力值超过7点），部分卡片会有额外效果。
觉醒：战斗开始时，额外抽取1张技能。

English:
Being a single wing is unusual—I’ve grown tired of hearing that. 
But... being unusual means being the most special! 
I’ll prove it. As your elder sister, as everyone’s role model! 
Now, my adorable siblings! Leave the rest to your big sister!
Chinese:
單翼就是不尋常，這句話我都聽膩了呢。
但是……不尋常就代表是最特別的！
就由我來證明。作為姊姊、作為大家的範本！
那麼，可愛的弟妹們！之後就交給姊姊大人我吧！

English:
Unlike my plain older brother, your big sister still shines bright today! 
—Silver Purity: Arjent. 
If you think I’m a cute little brother, then stop making me run errands!? 
—The Eldest Son with the Black Single Wing: Noir.
Chinese:
跟樸素的哥哥大人不同，姊姊大人今天依然耀眼啊！
──銀色清純‧雅爾貞特
如果覺得我是可愛的弟弟，那就別叫我去跑腿喔！？
──擁有漆黑單翼的長男‧諾爾

English: Discard the bottommost skill in hand and draw 1 skill.
Chinese: 丢弃1个手中最下面的技能，抽1个技能。
丢弃1个技能，抽取2个技能。

English:
Restore 2 Mana. 
If [Number of times cards were discarded this battle] exceeds 4, discard 2 skills and draw 3 skills.
Chinese:
回复2点AP。
若[本场战斗中，丢弃手牌的次数]大于4次，丢弃2个技能，抽取3个技能。

English:
Reduce own HP to 1. All party members gain the [Last Stand] buff for 1 turn: Grants Healing Gauge Protection. All damage received becomes 0. 
Enchant 1 - Add 1 copy of The Great Mediator·Zoe (Cost 4, no Enchant effect) to the deck. Draw 1 skill.
Chinese: 自己的体力降为1点。所有队员获得1回合BUFF[背水一战]：保护体力极限，受到的伤害转变为0。

English: Reduce own HP to 1. All party members gain the [Last Stand] buff for 1 turn: Grants Healing Gauge Protection. All damage received becomes 0.
Chinese:
自己的体力降为1点。所有队员获得1回合BUFF[背水一战]：保护体力极限，受到的伤害转变为0。
激奏1 - 增加1张费用为4且没有激奏效果的伟大的调停者·佐伊到牌库中。抽取1个技能。
丢弃1个技能，抽取1个技能。

English: If [Number of times cards were discarded this turn] is 1 or more, deal &a damage to a random enemy.
Chinese: 若[本回合中，丢弃手牌的次数]大于等于1次，对随机敌人造成&a伤害。

English: If [Number of times cards were discarded this turn] is 1 or more, deal &a damage to a random enemy.
Chinese: 若[本回合中，丢弃手牌的次数]大于等于1次，对随机敌人造成&a伤害。

丢弃1个技能。
觉醒 - 抽取1个技能。

English:
Enchant 1 - Discard 1 skill and draw 1 skill. 
Awakened - Draw 2 skills instead.
Chinese:
激奏1 - 丢弃1个技能，抽取1个技能。
觉醒 - 改为抽取2个技能。
丢弃1个技能，抽取1个技能。

English:
Add 1 copy of Fortress Crab (0 Cost, deals &a damage) with Exclude to hand. 
Enchant 2 - Swiftness; Discard 1 skill and draw 2 skills.
Chinese:
将1张附带放逐的[城塞巨蟹]（0费，造成&a伤害。）加入手中。
激奏2 - 迅速；丢弃1个技能，抽取2个技能。

English:
When played, discard 2 of your skills and gain 1 Max Mana. 
If [Number of times cards were discarded this battle] exceeds 2 (excluding this skill), draw 3 skills.
Chinese:
打出时舍弃自己2个技能，使自己最大法力值+1。
若[这张战斗中，丢弃手牌的次数]大于2次（不包括这个技能），则会抽取3个技能。

English: Awakened - Deal &a damage instead. Gain the [Black and White Frenzy] buff for 1 turn: Protects Healing Gauge. Increases all resistances.
Chinese: 觉醒 - 改为造成&a伤害。获得1回合BUFF：保护体力极限。全抗性增加。

English: Black and White Frenzy·Noir and Brun

Discard - Add 1 copy of Black and White Frenzy·Noir and Brun (0 Cost, Exclude) to hand, dealing &a damage instead. 
Awakened - Deal &b damage instead. Gain the [Black and White Frenzy] buff for 1 turn: Grants Healing Gauge Protection. Increases all resistances.
Chinese:
弃牌 - 将1张0费的、附带放逐的黑白乱舞·诺尔与卜朗加入手牌，改为造成&a伤害。
觉醒 - 改为造成&b伤害。获得1回合BUFF：保护体力极限。全抗性增加。

English: Black and White Frenzy·Noir and Brun
Deal &a damage to a random enemy.
Chinese: 对随机一个敌人造成&a伤害。

English:
Choose - Play either [Rowen’s Roar] or [Beyd’s Minion]. 
Awakened - Play both instead. 

Rowen’s Roar: Gain 1 Max Mana. 
Beyd’s Minion: Deal &a damage to a random enemy.
Chinese:
选择 - 从[罗文的咆哮][拜迪的爪牙]中选1张打出。
觉醒 - 从[选择]改为[同时打出]。

罗文的咆哮：使自己最大法力值+1。
拜迪的爪牙：对随机一个敌人造成&a伤害。

English:
Gain 1 Max Mana. 
Awakened - Restore &a HP. Draw 2 skills.
Chinese:
使自己最大法力值+1。
觉醒 - 治疗自己&a。抽取2个技能。

English: If the enemy is already damaged, deal an additional &a damage.
Chinese: 若敌人已受伤，额外造成&a伤害。

English: Add 1 copy of [Silverfrost Breath] to hand.
Chinese: 增加1张[银冰吐息]到手牌中。

English:
Prioritize drawing 2 highest-Cost skills from the deck. 
Awakened - Draw 3 instead.
Chinese:
优先抽取2张牌堆中费用最高的技能。
觉醒 - 从2张改为3张。

English: Skills with the [Enchant] keyword can be cast at a lower Mana cost with weaker effects when current Mana is insufficient.
Chinese: 带有[激奏]词缀的技能在当前法力值不足时，可以以低法力值释放较弱的技能效果。

English: Skills with the [Awakened] keyword gain additional effects when Max Mana is 7 or higher.
Chinese: 带有[觉醒]词缀的技能在最大法力值大于等于7时获得额外效果。

English: Skills with the [Discard] keyword trigger additional effects when discarded.
Chinese: 带有[弃牌]词缀的技能在被丢弃时会触发额外效果。
